column1: Bosscat Kitchen & Libations////FOOD: shrimp and grits are outstanding.  I order this dish often at other places
column2: and they do a great job of it here.  Very flavorful.  Salmon salad was tasty; fish was fresh.  We tried the burgers as well. First time
column3: they were great.  One other time the meat seemed undercooked or older
column4: but there is definitely some inconsistency.  Generally
column5: I think their burgers are a solid choice; however
column6: they are really missing a regular French fry side.  Their wedge fries are underwhelming: overcooked
column8: no flavor.   We tried their fried potato salad as a side - solid.  But you really need fries with a burger.... just saying.
